<h3 id="X11415">X(11415)&nbsp;=&nbsp;PERSPECTOR OF THESE TRIANGLES: 1st ANTI-CIRCUMPERP AND 2nd CONWAY</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a^4+2*(b+c)*a^3-2*b*c*a^2-2*(b^3+c^3)*a-(b^2-c^2)^2  :  :
<br>
<b>X(11415) = 3*X(2)-2*X(46) = 2*r*X(4)-(R+r)*X(8)  = (R+r)*(4*R+r)*X(7)-2*R*(2*r+3*R)*X(21)</b>
<p>X(11415) lies on these lines:{1,5905}, {2,46}, {4,8}, {7,21}, {10,6871}, {20,224}, {30,5730}, {40,908}, {63,946}, {65,2478}, {69,3702}, {78,516}, {90,10529}, {100,6361}, {145,10572}, {200,9589}, {226,5250}, {278,3559}, {377,960}, {388,3877}, {390,10393}, {404,3474}, {411,9778}, {497,1858}, {518,1898}, {527,11240}, {529,2098}, {758,1479}, {920,3086}, {944,7491}, {997,1770}, {1005,10578}, {1056,3890}, {1058,3873}, {1125,4652}, {1155,6921}, {1158,6890}, {1191,3782}, {1265,5300}, {1329,2476}, {1478,3878}, {1519,5709}, {1621,3487}, {1657,10609}, {1697,11239}, {1699,6734}, {1737,5187}, {1788,4193}, {2057,7994}, {2550,3876}, {2975,3560}, {3336,10200}, {3338,10586}, {3476,5330}, {3585,3899}, {3685,4329}, {3715,9710}, {3812,4679}, {3816,5221}, {3870,10624}, {3886,4101}, {3889,7671}, {3901,4857}, {3916,5886}, {3944,5230}, {3951,4847}, {4018,5722}, {4312,8583}, {4415,5710}, {4640,6910}, {5087,6931}, {5119,10528}, {5289,7354}, {5435,7098}, {5493,6745}, {5550,6857}, {5657,6842}, {5703,8069}, {5731,6868}, {5734,6930}, {5744,6824}, {5748,6825}, {5775,6866}, {5854,9802}, {6001,6836}, {6691,9782}, {6735,7991}, {6828,7681}, {6856,10129}, {6957,7686}, {9580,11523}, {9960,10430}, {11037,11111}</p>
<p>
X(11415) = reflection of X(8) in X(3436)<br>
X(11415) = isogonal conjugate of X(34447)<br>
X(11415) = anticomplement of X(46)<br>
X(11415) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (4,3869,8), (8,5180,962), (21,3485,3616), (40,908,5552), (63,946,10527), (72,3434,8), (329,962,8), (960,1836,377), (997,1770,4190), (3485,5698,21), (3681,5082,8), (3869,5057,4), (4640,11375,6910)<br>
